data.additional_notes: This game is not able to maintain a locked 30 FPS. Frame rates fluctuate heavily during gameplay and cutscenes, with dips as low as 10 FPS in demanding scenarios and cutscenes averaging around 24 FPS. However, as a turn-based strategy game, fluctuating FPS does not heavily impact playability. Higher graphical fidelity was chosen for this setup, as performance drops are tolerable given the game’s nature.

reports_summary: From a single write-up, the Steam Deck LCD delivers an uneven run of Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters, commonly dropping below 30 FPS and plunging to around 10 FPS in demanding moments while cutscenes sit in the mid‑20s. As a turn‑based game these swings are less harmful to play, and the reporter accepted higher visual quality despite the trade‑off. The practical takeaway is that the title is approachable on the device but benefits from trimming a few heavy effects or enforcing an FPS cap to keep frame pacing steadier.
